short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects React components inside of AngularJS ZVM web app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When the extension is on, the web application called ZVM which was developed originally in AngularJS will show in green color all areas of code that were migrated into ReactJS. This way our product managers and developers can easily know the progress of the company procedure of migrating AngularJS code into React only by looking at the UI of the application. The extension injects a CSS file into to the web page which changes styles only. It has no effect on functionality at all.
